item.title: Still no sign of surging layoffs despite Amazon, UPS job cuts
item.description: State jobless claims point to a soft-but-stable labor market.

item.title: Disney’s YouTube blackout marks a major escalation in a new front of the carriage wars
item.description: The breakdown is the most serious in a string of fights YouTube has had with Paramount, Fox, NBCUniversal and TelevisaUnivision as the streamer rises ...

item.title: AI might not take your job after all — and you can use it to your advantage
item.description: Venture capitalist Hemant Taneja: AI won’t just build on the internet boom — it will be bigger.

item.title: Should you buy Apple’s stock after earnings? These analysts see better options.
item.description: Apple sees iPhone trends improving, but analysts note its stock is more expensive than other hardware and smartphone plays like Qualcomm and Alphabet.

item.title: Amazon’s stock soars as earnings show ‘the AI narrative has flipped positive’
item.description: Investors were worried AWS was falling behind in AI. A new growth trajectory has restored confidence in Amazon’s cloud business.
